definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: (place of) Destruction, Ruin, ’Abaddon (cf. 0’abdono0 SyrVer Job 28:32 etc.)—[[אֲבַדּוֹן]] Job 26:6 (+ 4 t.); abbrev. [[אבדה]] Kt [[אֲבַדּוֹ]] Qr † Pr 27:20.—Place of ruin in Shₑ’ôl for lost or ruined dead, as development of earlier distinction of condition in Shₑ’ôl (v. [[שְׁאוֹל]]). Only in WisdLt; Job 31:12; ‖[[שׁאול]] Job 26:6, Pr 15:11 Pr 27:20; ‖[[מות]] Job 28:22; ‖[[קבר]] Ps 88:12.
